thread.title: Kelly Keyes

author: Kelly Keyes
title: Kelly Keyes
text: Thanks to Kym! We have bought a couple of items from her now, she's really helpful, thoughtful and spends lots of time to ensure that you get exactly what you want. The quality is always top notch but the prices are far lower than a lot of the competitors. On this ocaison, I wasn't able to take the ring away with me as it needed to be sized. But as promised, Kym packaged my ring and sent it to me by special delivery at no extra cost. Excellent service!
